description: The back up failure alarm trap.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LOAD-BACKUP-MIB::hwBackupFailAlarm HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-LOAD-BACKUP-MIB::hwTrapBackupResult i 9999

description: Frame Index,the number of the frame in the device.
This table is also adopted by the case-shaped device with Agent
(For example, the MA5105).
There is no frame in this kind of device. Thus it is placed on
the rack with other devices During implementation. The frame index
is specified as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: Slot index that identifies the physical position of a slot.
The case-shaped device is treated as the one with only one slot whose index is always set as 0.
If there are ports in the frame, all the ports on the frame must be virtualized as
a fixed slot index (equal to the virtual slots which is the max slot index for the frame plus
1.) Their slot index is also fixedly set as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Definition node of the backup failure cause.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LOAD-BACKUP-MIB::hwTrapBackupResult

description: The load failure alarm trap.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LOAD-BACKUP-MIB::hwLoadFailAlarm HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-LOAD-BACKUP-MIB::hwTrapLoadResult i 9999

variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: The load result.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LOAD-BACKUP-MIB::hwTrapLoadResult

description: Save configuration to flash failure trap.
The failure cause definition node of the memory running copy and resume.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LOAD-BACKUP-MIB::hwCopyAndSaveResult

description: Save configuration to flash success notification .
The configuration changed event alarm.

event.Summary: Configuration changed event alarm occurred due to $v1

description: The configuration changed cause.
